text: Por gum Barnabas Antiokra ki. Mani Antiokra kim, gumgi mbari, mbe Zudian kegap, Antiokan zergi. Mbe zergap, mba Antiokan Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, mbe harigi ŋgui gumgi gu mbigi ma, mbe Zudaiŋ fhuvara. Mbe Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mbe nzuav, mbe khɨvav, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde Moses suaŋgi tɨva zɨn ŋgɨv warir fooŋ tharga, Fhe Bakɨme taagip nde ndigirga tuktɨgi fhuvara.”
